SRP.Q: In 1960, what is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the line representing Azure Enclave relative to Sector Beta?
SRP.A: In 1960, Azure Enclave is {below} Sector Beta in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: On Stellar City Core, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 1960 relative to that in 1962 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: On Stellar City Core, the data point in 1960 is {below} and to the {left} of the data point in 1962.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Outer Rim Settlements's Life Expectancy levels?
VPR.A: Outer Rim Settlements's life expectancy levels show a {stable falling} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Azure Enclave's Life Expectancy levels?

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Sector Beta's Life Expectancy levels?

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Stellar City Core's Life Expectancy levels?
VPR.A: Stellar City Core's life expectancy levels show a {stable falling} trend.

NC.A: In 1964, {Azure Enclave} had the highest life expectancy.

VA.Q: Perform the Douglas-Peucker algorithm to simplify the line representing the Azure Enclave. List the x-coordinates of data points to be preserved.(2 points need to be provided)
VA.A: The x-coordinates of the data points to be preserved are: {1960, 1964}.
